title:
From Listings to Leads.
Automated & Accurate.
content:

title:
Claim Faster.
Outreach Smarter.
content:
One surplus recovery firm used our data to file two successful claims within 3 weeks.

Access to verified owner addresses, parcel data, and linked PDFs made their process 10× more efficient.

title: Data That Pays You Back
content:
Claim agents used our early-stage tax deed data to plan outreach before auctions even occurred.

They now monitor upcoming opportunities — not just stale results — and close more deals, faster.
